item.title: Concentric Cloud Solutions Virtualizes Your Business
item.description: You’ve been bombarded with information about virtualization, unsure if it can help control unpredictable business expenses. You might feel overwhelmed about the process of deploying virtualization. There’s no need to worry, Concentric can guide you through it. Initially confined to local data centers, virtualization has migrated to the cloud. The fundamental concept is maximizing hardware performance. This is achieved by making a single server function as multiple servers, or transforming a cluster of smaller servers into a powerful computing unit.

item.title: Beogram 4000: Adjusting the Platter and the Chassis
item.description: Having completed the restoration of the Beogram 4000, I noticed the platter wasn’t sitting correctly within its aluminum panel. It needed adjustments to align it properly. The service manual suggests adjusting the platter in relation to the chassis first, and then aligning the chassis within the enclosure. This ensures the platter sits flush and centered within the panel, achieving that desirable “Beoloving” aesthetic. To illustrate the process, I created two videos.
